title: Pluralsight - Informational Interviews
description:
Pluralsight - Informational Interviews
--------------------------------------------

Informational interviews is one of the most effective networking strategies to help you increase the size of your network, nurture relationships and share your brand in your industry.

Use informational interviews as a powerful tactic to ramp up your networking. Informational interviews are powerful, if done right. In this course we will explore the preparation before the interview, what you do when you are there, and what to do after you have finished the interview.

Authored by: Jason Alba
Jason Alba is founder of JibberJobber.com, an online relationship manager for professionals to manage their career and job search. Jason is the author of I'm on LinkedIn Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Now What??? and coauthor of I'm on Facebook Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Now What??? and specializes in helping professionals with career management, network, and personal branding.
